# XIFF <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" alt="" width="120" style="background-color: #FFF"/>

XIFF is designed to provide database access, machine learning and plotting functionality, 
comparison class handling and R/shiny functions for CLIFF and TIFF.

